thread.section_title: TravelMole Media Group, L.L.C. | UK Business Travel News
thread.title: CTM launches 'pick and mix' website

title: CTM launches 'pick and mix' website
text:
Sunday 18th October 2015 CTM launches 'pick and mix' website 
Corporate travel management specialist CTM has re-launched its website and booking portal enabling clients to 'pick and mix' travel products.The new online offering includes a 'What we offer' section where clients can choose from corporate travel management and online booking services to eProcurement solutions and expense management. 
Sunday, October 18, 2015
